PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-11792017-09-22,  ,  ,  TC,  LPA, 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Laurentian Pilotage Tariff Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the LAURENTIAN PILOTAGE TARIFF REGULATIONS in order to harmonize the Tarriff Regulations with some of the rules setting the fees paid to the Corporation des pilotes du Saint-Laurent Central Inc. which will make it possible to reduce the pilotage charges payable by clients by a similar amount.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0203 Publication Date: 2017-10-04
AttachmentsAttachment
